info.name: IkeNei API Collection
info.description: Complete REST API collection for IkeNei Backend - A comprehensive survey and feedback management system

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Authentication endpoints for login, registration, and profile management

item.name: Accounts Management

request.description: Get all accounts with filtering (search, state, type)

item.description: Account management endpoints for system administrators

item.name: Surveys

request.description: Get all surveys with filtering and pagination
Get available surveys for current account
Get surveys where account is subject/respondent
Get surveys pending approval (System Admin only)
Get surveys filtered by user role

item.description: Survey management endpoints for creating, managing, and executing surveys

item.name: Survey Responses

request.description: Get survey form by response token (PUBLIC - no authentication required)
Submit survey response (PUBLIC - no authentication required)
Get all responses for a survey run (ADMIN - authentication required)
Get analytics for a survey run (ADMIN - authentication required)

item.description: Survey response endpoints for public survey submission and response management

item.name: Subjects
item.description: Subject management endpoints for managing survey subjects

item.name: Respondents

request.description: Get account's respondents with optional subject filter

item.description: Respondent management endpoints for managing survey respondents

item.name: Traits
item.description: Trait management endpoints for managing survey traits and competencies

item.name: Reports

request.description: Get available report types for DefineReport dropdown
Get available data sources for DefineReport dropdown
Get available chart types for DefineReport dropdown
Get available grouping options for DefineReport dropdown

item.description: Report management endpoints for creating and generating reports

item.name: Analytics
item.description: Analytics endpoints for system administrators to view metrics and insights

item.name: Dashboard
item.description: Dashboard endpoints for role-specific dashboard data and statistics

item.name: Billing

request.description: Get billing records with filtering (account, date range, status)
Create new billing record (auto-generated on survey completion)
Get billing records for specific account
Calculate billing amount for survey usage

item.description: Billing management endpoints for tracking and managing survey usage costs

item.name: Files
item.description: File management endpoints for uploading, downloading, and managing files

item.name: Notifications
item.description: Notification management endpoints for managing user notifications

item.name: Settings

request.description: Get all system settings with filtering

item.description: System settings management endpoints for system administrators

item.name: Categories
item.description: Category management endpoints for managing various system categories
